alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Covington; Jasper; Jefferson Davis; Jones; Lawrence (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued November 29 at 7:33PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of east central Mississippi, south central Mississippi and southeast Mississippi, including the following counties, in east central Mississippi, Clarke and Jasper. In south central Mississippi, Jefferson Davis, Lawrence and Marion. In southeast Mississippi, Covington, Forrest, Jones and Lamar. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Multiple rounds of showers and thunderstorms capable of producing heavy rain will develop and move across the watch area tonight. Additional rainfall on already saturated ground will quickly run off and could lead to additional flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Clarke; Covington; Jasper; Jefferson Davis; Jones; Lawrence
